name: tasting
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an occasion when people can try different food or drinks of a particular kind in order to compare them: The hotel arranges regular wine tastings on the terrace. The event includes tastings of tomatoes and apples from our farm.
More examplesFewer examplesThe chicken did not score well in blind tastings (= where the people did not know which one they were tasting).There will be cooking demonstrations and tastings of local culinary specialities.The winery offers free tastings and regular tours of the vineyard.For anyone who loves coffee, our monthly coffee tastings are not to be missed.We'll be holding food tastings throughout the day.
